languages.text:
И спустились они в нижние отсеки, и легли в каменный гроб, и глаза закрыли. И услышал{mf||а} тогда Домин голос Неумирающего Императора, и обещал он новую встречу, скорую встречу.
А после кончилось странствие. Домин же, увидев Смерть прежде срока своего, прош{mf|ел|ла} туда и вернул{mf|ся|ась} обратно, чтобы принести нам весть и мудрость: без сомнения ступай тропой Кровавой паутины, ибо ведет она к Нему, как и все в мироздании. Он — есть Смерть.

And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Domin heard the Undying Emperor's voice promising they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.
languages.original_text:
И спустились они в нижние отсеки, и легли в каменный гроб, и глаза закрыли. И услышал{mf||а} тогда Домин голос Неумирающего Императора, и обещал он новую встречу, скорую встречу.
А после кончилось странствие. Домин же, увидев Смерть прежде срока своего, прош{mf|ел|ла} туда и вернул{mf|ся|ась} обратно, чтобы принести нам весть и мудрость: без сомнения ступай тропой Кровавой паутины, ибо ведет она к Нему, как и все в мироздании. Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text:
And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Enim heard the Undying Emperor's voice, which promised they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Enim, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and came back to bring us these tidings and this wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk the path of the Bloodspun Web, for that path leads to Him, as does all of existence. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Enim heard the Undying Emperor's voice, which promised they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Enim, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and came back to bring us these tidings and this wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk the path of the Bloodspun Web, for that path leads to Him, as does all of existence. Ayen Kaen Dho.

Ayen Kaen Dho.

And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Enim, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk the path of the Bloodspun Web, for that path leads to Him, as does all of existence. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.

And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Domin heard the Undying Emperor's voice promising they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.

languages.text:
Und sie stiegen hinab in die unteren Module, legten sich in einen steinernen Sarg und schlossen die Augen. Und {mf|der|die} Domin hörte die Stimme des Todlosen Imperators, die versprach, sie würden sich schon bald wiedersehen.
Und so endete ihre Reise. Und so kam es, dass {mf|der|die} Domin, {mf|der|die} Tod vor {mf|seiner|ihrer} Zeit gesehen hatte, dorthin und wieder zurück reiste, um uns diese Kunde und Weisheit zu bringen: Seid frei von Zweifeln, wenn ihr dem Faden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes folgt, denn dessen Fäden führt zu Ihm, wie es die gesamte Existenz tut. Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text:
And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Domin heard the Undying Emperor's voice promising they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.

traits.locale_text:
Und sie stiegen hinab in die unteren Module, legten sich in einen steinernen Sarg und schlossen die Augen. Und {mf|der|die} Domin hörte die Stimme des Todlosen Imperators, die versprach, sie würden sich schon bald wiedersehen.
Und so endete ihre Reise. Und so kam es, dass {mf|der|die} Domin, {mf|der|die} Tod vor {mf|seiner|ihrer} Zeit gesehen hatte, dorthin und wieder zurück reiste, um uns diese Kunde und Weisheit zu bringen: Seid frei von Zweifeln, wenn ihr dem Faden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes folgt, denn dessen Fäden führt zu Ihm, wie es die gesamte Existenz tut. Er ist der Tod.

languages.text:
Y descendieron a las cubiertas inferiores, yacieron en un féretro de piedra y cerraron los ojos. Y {mf|el|la} Domin oyó la voz del Emperador Inmortal, prometiendo que se volverían a ver pronto.
Y así fue que su viaje terminó. {mf|El|La} Domin, habiendo presenciado la Muerte antes de que llegara su hora, fue y regresó para traernos estas noticias, esta sabiduría: no dudes al recorrer los hilos de la Red Sanguinolenta, pues esos hilos conducen a Él, al igual que toda la existencia. Él es la muerte.
languages.original_text:
And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Domin heard the Undying Emperor's voice promising they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.

traits.locale_text:
Y descendieron a las cubiertas inferiores, yacieron en un féretro de piedra y cerraron los ojos. Y {mf|el|la} Domin oyó la voz del Emperador Inmortal, prometiendo que se volverían a ver pronto.
Y así fue que su viaje terminó. {mf|El|La} Domin, habiendo presenciado la Muerte antes de que llegara su hora, fue y regresó para traernos estas noticias, esta sabiduría: no dudes al recorrer los hilos de la Red Sanguinolenta, pues esos hilos conducen a Él, al igual que toda la existencia. Él es la muerte.

languages.text:
そして彼らは下層ベイに檻、石の棺に横たわって目を閉じた。ドミンはすぐにまた会うことを予言する不死の皇帝の声を聞いた。
そこで彼らの旅は終わった。そして、ドミンは時が来る前に死を目にし、この知らせと知恵を我らにもたらすべくそこを往復した。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの糸を辿るときは、疑いをすべて捨てよ。その糸はあらゆる存在と同じく、主に通じているのだから。彼は死だ。
languages.original_text:
And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Domin heard the Undying Emperor's voice promising they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.

traits.locale_text:
そして彼らは下層ベイに檻、石の棺に横たわって目を閉じた。ドミンはすぐにまた会うことを予言する不死の皇帝の声を聞いた。
そこで彼らの旅は終わった。そして、ドミンは時が来る前に死を目にし、この知らせと知恵を我らにもたらすべくそこを往復した。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの糸を辿るときは、疑いをすべて捨てよ。その糸はあらゆる存在と同じく、主に通じているのだから。彼は死だ。

languages.text:
两人来到了底层甲板处，躺在石棺之中，闭上了眼睛。那个时候，秘者听到了不死之神的声音，保证他们很快就会再次见面。
他们的旅程就此结束。秘者在大限将临之前，就亲眼见过了死亡的景象。{mf|他|她}从亡者的国度归来，为我们带来了充满智慧的话语——当你沿着织血罗网的丝线前进时，不要有任何怀疑，因为祂便是丝线的终点，正如祂是所有存在的终点一样。祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text:
And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Domin heard the Undying Emperor's voice promising they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.

traits.locale_text:
两人来到了底层甲板处，躺在石棺之中，闭上了眼睛。那个时候，秘者听到了不死之神的声音，保证他们很快就会再次见面。
他们的旅程就此结束。秘者在大限将临之前，就亲眼见过了死亡的景象。{mf|他|她}从亡者的国度归来，为我们带来了充满智慧的话语——当你沿着织血罗网的丝线前进时，不要有任何怀疑，因为祂便是丝线的终点，正如祂是所有存在的终点一样。祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text:
Ils descendirent dans les baies inférieures, s'allongèrent dans un cercueil de pierre et fermèrent les yeux. {mf|Le|La} Domin entendit la voix de l'Empereur Immortel lui promettant qu'ils se reverraient bientôt.
C'est ainsi que leur voyage prit fin. {mf|Le|La} Domin, ayant vu la Mort avant son heure, revint parmi nous pour nous apporter ces nouvelles et cette sagesse : ne doutez pas lorsque vous empruntez les fils de la Toile de Sang, car ces fils, de même que toute l'existence, mènent tout droit à Lui. Il incarne la mort.
languages.original_text:
And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Domin heard the Undying Emperor's voice promising they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.

Il incarne la mort.

languages.text:
Ardından alt güvertelere indiler. Taştan bir tabuta yatarak gözlerini kapattılar. Domin, Ölmeyen İmparator'un bir kez daha ve yakında karşılaşacaklarını vadeden sesini duydu.
Bunun üzerine yolculukları sona erdi. Kendi vakti dolmadan önce Ölüm'ü gören, oraya seyahat edip bize bu havadislerle bilgelikleri aktarmak için geri dönen işte o Domin'di. Dedi ki Kanipi Ağı'nın ipliklerinde yürürken kuşkudan arının. Çünkü bu ipliklerin sonu, tıpkı tüm varoluş gibi Ona çıkar. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text:
And they descended into the lower bays, lay down in a stone coffin, and closed their eyes. And the Domin heard the Undying Emperor's voice promising they would meet again, and soon.
And thereupon their journey ended. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these tidings and wisdom: be free of doubt as you walk along the threads of the Bloodspun Web, for those threads lead to Him, as does all of existence. He is Death.
